datoCmsProject.title: Interactive Photo Gallery
datoCmsProject.description: Interactive photo gallery that displays images larger when clicked.
datoCmsProject.moreInfo:
My intro to CSS grid system and modal overlays.  

Features a photo grid layout and a search/filter functionality of returned photos.  Each photo is clickable into a modal overlay.  Photos can be traversed back/forward from the photo overlay.

Assigned from Treehouse Tech Degree Program (www.teamtreehouse.com).
features: Photo modal (larger display of clicked image)
